title: HALT Check-In
description: Assess if you're Hungry, Angry, Lonely, or Tired - common relapse triggers

fields.label: Am I Hungry?
fields.help: Have I eaten today? Am I dehydrated?

fields.label: Am I Angry?
fields.help: Am I frustrated, resentful, or holding onto anger?

fields.label: Am I Lonely?
fields.help: Do I feel isolated or disconnected?

fields.label: Am I Tired?
fields.help: Am I physically or emotionally exhausted?

fields.label: What will I do right now to address my needs?
fields.help: Be specific - eat a meal, call someone, take a nap, etc.
